# TASK: AWARDS FEATURE

## Context

- Admin should manage awards dynamically
- Awards displayed on portfolio frontend

## Backend Tasks

- Create `Award` Mongoose model:
  - Fields: title, description, year, image (optional)
- Add CRUD routes under `/api/awards`
- Use existing auth middleware
- Proper error handling

## Frontend Tasks

- Fetch awards via API
- Dynamically display awards section
- Ensure layout matches existing design
- Do not modify unrelated components

## Output Expectations

- Only new model, routes, controllers, and frontend updates
- Maintain clean, production-ready code
